revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: The third year of Imperator Caesar Nerva Trajanus Augustus Germanicus, Thoth 20. Papontos son of Auseios (?) son of Auseios (?) his mother being Tapontos, has paid through Lusimachos alias Louppos, chiristes, the suntaximon tax of the second year, twenty five silver drachmas 2 obols, total 25 dr. 2 ob. The third year of Imperator Caesar Nerva Trajanus Augustus Germanicus, Thoth 20. Phï¿½sis son of Herak() son of Leon, his mother being Thermouthion, has paid through Lusimachos alias Louppos, chiristes, the suntaximon tax of the second year, twenty five silver drachmas 2 obols, total 25 dr. 2 ob. The third year of Imperator Caesar Nerva Trajanus Augustus Germanicus, Thoth 20. Apunchis son of Papneus son of Harmiusis, his mother being Taarmiusis, has paid through Lusimachos alias Louppos, one silver drachma 2 obols, total 1 dr. 2 ob.
